data.title: Tire Degradation Detected
data.explanation: Predicted tire loss: 0.65s per lap. Estimated 0.77 laps until 0.5s cumulative loss.
data.review_notes: Reviewed telemetry - driver reports good tire feel. Deferring pit stop by 1 lap based on driver feedback.

human_override.reason: Driver feedback contradicts model prediction - driver reports tires feel good

modified_recommendation.one_liner: Monitor closely - pit on Lap 9 (1 lap delay)
modified_recommendation.voiceover_script: Monitor closely - pit on Lap 9. Deferred pit stop: Lap 9. Driver reports good tire feel. Monitor for next 2 laps. Re-evaluate if degradation accelerates.

bullets: Monitor tire stress in sectors 2 and 3
recommendation.voiceover_script: Recommendation: Pit on lap 8 (optimal window). Optimal pit window: Lap 8. Estimated time saved: 2.3s. Monitor tire stress in sectors 2 and 3.
